servinfo.title: Exhaust System Description
servinfo.ptxt: The exhaust system consists of an exhaust manifold, a turbo charger, a catalytic converter in a catalyst case, a diesel particurate filter (if equipped), an exhaust pipes, a muffler and seals, gasket and etc.
The catalytic converter is an emission control device added to the exhaust system to reduce the levels of Hydrocarbon (HC) and Carbon Monoxide (CO) in the exhaust gas.
